backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, habits, records, diary entries, investment tracking, and access‑controlled CRUD operations with internal logging and health check.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to frontend files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global styles defining OKLCH theme tokens, dark mode variables, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the React app via root div and module script entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication gating, silent retries, user profile loading, and rendering either LoginScreen, ProfileSetup, or TrackerDashboard.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedIni: Empty placeholder component file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/CollapsibleHabit: Collapsible panel that loads habits and displays the HabitManager with loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/DiaryAnalyticsCh: Component computing and rendering a line chart correlating diary energy levels with habit consistency for the current month.
frontend/src/components/DiaryPage.tsx: Diary entry page with date picker, reflection fields, data loading, parsing, and saving diary entries.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches errors and renders a fallback with reset support.
frontend/src/components/ExportDataPage.t: Page for selecting a date range, loading exportable data, and exporting it to XLSX or PDF.
frontend/src/components/ExportDateRangeP: Date range selector ensuring valid start/end ordering using popover calendar pickers.
frontend/src/components/ExportPreviewSec: Renders preview sections for reflections, habit records, and investments within the selected export range.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorFallba: UI fallback for fatal errors with options to reload or retry.
frontend/src/components/HabitGrid.tsx: Monthly habit grid displaying records, supporting completion toggling, amount editing, and scroll preservation.
frontend/src/components/HabitManager.tsx: UI component for creating, editing, and deleting habits with validation and unit handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header showing navigation tabs, user info, and logout menu based on current view.
Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentGoalCa: Card component displaying an investment goal with edit and delete dialogs and progress calculation.
Page showing a list of investment goals and a dialog to create new ones.
frontend/src/components/LoadingTimeoutFa: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with loading, error display, and login button.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTargetsEd: Displays monthly target and progress summaries for applicable habits by filtering habits, summing monthly records, and formatting totals.
frontend/src/components/MonthTabs.tsx: Scrollable month selector tabs with drag-to-scroll and auto-centering of the selected month.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Provides a profile setup form allowing users to enter and save their name with basic validation and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/ProgressCharts.t: Generates monthly progress visuals including a pie chart, per-habit progress bars, and daily trend data using calculated stats.
frontend/src/components/TrackerDashboard: Main dashboard managing navigation, data loading, month selection, and rendering habit tracking, charts, and auxiliary pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHorizontalDragScro: Implements horizontal drag-to-scroll behavior using mouse events for overflow containers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading and managing identities and login/logout flows for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreserveHorizontal: Hook that preserves and restores a horizontal scroll position using refs and event listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, habits, and related backend data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSilentActorRetry.t: Silent retry mechanism that reinitializes the actor with exponential backoff when authenticated.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the app.
frontend/src/types/investments.ts: Deprecated placeholder file kept for backwards compatibility.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty type declaration stub for jspdf.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Empty type declaration stub for xlsx.
frontend/src/utils/diagnostics.ts: In-memory diagnostics logger that records events and formats them into a timeline.
frontend/src/utils/diaryAnalytics.ts: Computes daily habit consistency percentages based on habits and records.
frontend/src/utils/diaryDates.ts: Helpers for formatting, parsing, and generating YYYY-MM-DD date strings.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Parses human-readable time durations into seconds and formats seconds back into strings.
frontend/src/utils/exportFormatters.ts: Formatting helpers for export data including dates, habit units, and numeric amounts.
frontend/src/utils/exportPdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML-based PDF export of diary entries and habit records.
frontend/src/utils/exportXlsx.ts: Builds a multi‑sheet tab‑delimited XLSX-like file from export data and triggers a download.
frontend/src/utils/fileDownload.ts: Generates export filenames and provides a helper to download Blob objects.
frontend/src/utils/habitUnit.ts: Handles HabitUnit creation, labeling, type checks, and conversions for UI use.
frontend/src/utils/investments.ts: Formats and parses investment-related dates and amounts and computes goal progress.
frontend/src/utils/reportCsv.ts: Converts habit records into escaped CSV content and provides a CSV download helper.
frontend/src/utils/reportDateRange.ts: Converts dates to UTC components and constructs normalized date ranges.
frontend/src/utils/reportPdf.ts: Empty placeholder for PDF report utilities.
frontend/src/utils/reportStats.ts: Calculates habit performance, daily stats, and volume metrics for a reporting range.
frontend/src/utils/steadyClimbPlan.ts: Defines monthly fitness targets and retrieves values per habit and month.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Manages URL and sessionStorage parameters for routing and state persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state and requirements for enforcing Internet Identity login, using authenticated backend access, auto-loading user data, and removing the Connection Issue UI. Includes known issues, architectural notes, and new feature requests tied to these changes.
